languages.text: "Что ж, до сих пор у них ничего не вышло. И ваша заслуга в том весьма огромна". {n}Кассия горько смеется.{/n} "Не волнуйтесь, Вольный Торговец, мой Дом более не доставит вам проблем. Как вы и сказали — мой Атлас отныне стал моим же щитом".

traits.locale_text: "Что ж, до сих пор у них ничего не вышло. И ваша заслуга в том весьма огромна". {n}Кассия горько смеется.{/n} "Не волнуйтесь, Вольный Торговец, мой Дом более не доставит вам проблем. Как вы и сказали — мой Атлас отныне стал моим же щитом".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. As you said, my Atlas is now my shield."
languages.original_text: "Что ж, до сих пор у них ничего не вышло. И ваша заслуга в том весьма огромна". {n}Кассия горько смеется.{/n} "Не волнуйтесь, Вольный Торговец, мой Дом более не доставит вам проблем. Как вы и сказали — мой Атлас отныне стал моим же щитом".

traits.locale_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. As you said, my Atlas is now my shield."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. As you said, my Atlas is now my shield."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. As you said, my Atlas is now my shield."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. As you said, my Atlas is now my shield."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «De momento no han tenido éxito. Y gran parte de eso se lo debo a usted». {n}Cassia ríe amargamente.{/n} «No se preocupe, Comerciante Independiente. Mi casa no le molestará más. Como ha dicho, mi Atlas es ahora mi escudo».
languages.original_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. As you said, my Atlas is now my shield."

traits.locale_text: «De momento no han tenido éxito. Y gran parte de eso se lo debo a usted». {n}Cassia ríe amargamente.{/n} «No se preocupe, Comerciante Independiente. Mi casa no le molestará más. Como ha dicho, mi Atlas es ahora mi escudo».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「とはいえ、彼らは今のところ成功していません。その功績の大部分はあなたにあるのです」{n}カシアは苦笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「心配しないでください、自由開拓者様。私の家はもうあなたを悩ませることはありません。あなたの言うとおり、アトラスは私の盾となりました」
languages.original_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. As you said, my Atlas is now my shield."

traits.locale_text: 「とはいえ、彼らは今のところ成功していません。その功績の大部分はあなたにあるのです」{n}カシアは苦笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「心配しないでください、自由開拓者様。私の家はもうあなたを悩ませることはありません。あなたの言うとおり、アトラスは私の盾となりました」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “是啊，到目前为止，他们都失败了。这其中很大一部分应当归功于你。”{n}卡西娅苦涩地笑了起来。{/n}“不必担心，行商浪人，我们的家族不会再给你添麻烦了。正如你所说，我的圣仪现在就是我的盾牌。”
languages.original_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. As you said, my Atlas is now my shield."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，到目前为止，他们都失败了。这其中很大一部分应当归功于你。”{n}卡西娅苦涩地笑了起来。{/n}“不必担心，行商浪人，我们的家族不会再给你添麻烦了。正如你所说，我的圣仪现在就是我的盾牌。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Eh bien, ils ont échoué jusqu'ici et c'est en grande partie grâce à vous, {n}répond Cassia avec un rire amer.{/n} N'ayez crainte, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Ma maison ne vous causera plus d'ennuis. Comme vous l'avez dit, mon Atlas est désormais mon bouclier. »
languages.original_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. As you said, my Atlas is now my shield."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, ils ont échoué jusqu'ici et c'est en grande partie grâce à vous, {n}répond Cassia avec un rire amer.{/n} N'ayez crainte, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Ma maison ne vous causera plus d'ennuis. Comme vous l'avez dit, mon Atlas est désormais mon bouclier. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Nun, bisher waren sie erfolglos. Und das ist zu großen Teilen allein Euch zu verdanken." {n}Cassia lacht verbittert auf.{/n} "Sorgt Euch nicht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Mein Haus wird Euch nicht mehr behelligen. Wie Ihr gesagt habt, mein Atlas ist nun mein Schild."
languages.original_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. As you said, my Atlas is now my shield."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, bisher waren sie erfolglos. Und das ist zu großen Teilen allein Euch zu verdanken." {n}Cassia lacht verbittert auf.{/n} "Sorgt Euch nicht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Mein Haus wird Euch nicht mehr behelligen. Wie Ihr gesagt habt, mein Atlas ist nun mein Schild."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bugüne kadar başarılı olamadılar. Bunun büyük bir sebebi de sensin." {n}Cassia acı acı kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Hiç endişen olmasın Hür Tacir. Hanem artık başına bela olmayacak. Dedim ya, Atlasım beni koruyacak."
languages.original_text: "Well, they have been unsuccessful so far. And an enormous part of the credit for that lies with you." {n}Cassia laughs a bitter laugh.{/n} "Worry not, Rogue Trader. My House will trouble you no more. As you said, my Atlas is now my shield."

traits.locale_text: "Henüz başarılı olamadılar sonuçta. Bunun büyük bir sebebi de sensin." {n}Cassia acı acı kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Hiç endişen olmasın Hür Tacir. Hanem artık başına bela olmayacak. Dedim ya, Atlasım artık beni koruyacak."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
